R

removeCompany(Company) - Method in interface DataBaseTables.CompanyDAO
 
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class DataBaseTables.CompanyDBDAO
First getting all of the coupons that belong to the company and then deleting them from CouponTable Second thing is removing the company from CompanyTable and the third is removing id's of both company and coupon from the Join table
removeCompany(Company) - Method in class Facade.AdminFacade
first remove all the company's coupon (from all the tables) and after remove the company itself
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface DataBaseTables.CouponDAO
 
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class DataBaseTables.CouponDBDAO
This function removes the coupon from the database by its ID from the CustomerCoupon table companyCoupon table and the CouponTable table
removeCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class Facade.CompanyFacade
remove the coupon from the company and from all the customers who had it.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface DataBaseTables.CustomerDAO
 
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class DataBaseTables.CustomerDBDAO
Removing the customer from CustomerCoupon Join table removing him from the CustomerTable in the end closing connections and statements roll back method for if something goes wrong, and if so it will make no changes.
removeCustomer(Customer) - Method in class Facade.AdminFacade
remove the customer and all his coupon
returnConnection(Connection) - Method in class DataBaseTables.ConnectionPool
when user done with the connection he returns it and the method notifies that there is a free connection for the next user
rs - Variable in class DataBaseTables.CompanyDBDAO
 
rs - Variable in class DataBaseTables.CouponDBDAO
 
rs - Variable in class DataBaseTables.CustomerDBDAO
 
run() - Method in class DataBaseTables.DailyCouponExpirationTask
the run() method that executes the daily coupon update.
